answers.answer: Omg u gotta drink that nasty drink in five mins. I dont drink anything in five mins lol. Its wasn't bad after in was in but drinking it was nasty. Then I found out I was low on iron so the put me on 650mg of iron a day.
Ikr. My last two pregnancies it was five minutes. This one they told me 15.  Of course I was done in 5 because I'm a pro at it by now haha. But I'll never get over the way it feels to wait after.
I m having a second glucose test right nowFeelling dizzy , sleepy, bored  I have to stay for 3 hrs. My first test came out high.... I m 30 weeks
What kind of drink is this? A lot of ladies say it's nasty.
Its like the syrup from a soda. Lol. It's thick and super sweet.
Hmm.... Yes, that sounds distasteful.... Especially if it's a full cup that you have to drink.
It's like flat sunkist imo, it's really not that awful but bc it messes with your sugar level, it always leaves me feeling tired and kind of dizzy the rest of the day.
I can see how turtle414, I'm not really looking forward to it...Lol... Do the Dr's prefer someone drive you to that particular appt because of those side effects?

Took both tests and failed. The drink isnt to bad like flat orange soda. The whole dizziness and lightheadedness is your blood sugar rising to see if you are gestational. If it gets to bad let them know because if you cant stomach it now youll have to repeat it

With my first I tried to do it and i puked it up every time, my dr kept telling me to go back and do it I refused to do. I couldnt stomach it and felt embarrassed every time I tried with a room full of people me puking in the waste basket. I have to try and do it Thursday not looking forward to it

I had to do it at 18 weeks because I have higher risk for having diabetes since I had pancreatic cancer and had 2/3 of my pancreas removed. I passed the test (thank goodness) and my doctor said "oh that's good but bad news is you have to do it again later in your pregnancy" I wanted to let out a long and epic "noooooooooooooooo" lol
I just made my apt today for 3/17....you girls are really making it seem terrible, I'm not looking forward to it...lol
Just pray you don't have to do the three hour test. I got so ill from that one.
Dont worry it is not that bad..i did the three hour and was perfectly fime.u will be good:)
I had my test today, it really wasn't  that  bad, it tasted like a flat orange soda
I think its weird... but I loved the taste, it just made my tummy turn though.... I passed on first try :)))
I did mine today im 26+5 I had to drink it 4 times cause I couldnt keep it down . It was HORRIBLE !!!

With my first two I hated the taste. With this one it actually wasn't bad. For about the first 30 minutes I was so tired then boom, oddly fantastic the rest of the day. Baby was bouncing off the walls too. I'm surprised that it made me feel so great considering the first two times was awrful. It did give me heart burn tho.
Just did mine last week. I think the worst part is the blood draw. Thankfully my glucose came back negative for gestational diabetes but slightly anemic.

question: So I'm here at the lab doing my glucose test... My third pregnancy and I'm 30 and 3 days. Ughhhh. Who else hates this test.
title: Glucosetest.
